translations: 天使（cherub 复数）；可爱的人；天真无邪的人（尤指孩子）

sentences.sentence: Angels Cherubs and Seraphs - Dignity glory and honor.
sentences.translation: 天使、小天使、六翼天使-尊严、荣耀和名誉。

sentences.sentence: “He flew in a mantle of fire,” cried another, “and lovely little cherubs peeped out from the folds.”
sentences.translation: “他穿着一件火外套飞行，”另外一个说：“许多最美丽的天使藏在他的衣褶里向外窥望。”

sentences.sentence: Angels appear on earrings, thimbles and dinner plates, as flying pins and cherubs curled up asleep.
sentences.translation: 飞翔着或者蜷缩着睡觉的小天使的形象出现在耳环、胸针和餐盘上。
